messages.content: Given a video description, provide the following fields in a JSON dict: "output_format" (string), "duration" (string), "width" (integer), "height" (integer), and "elements" (array of dicts with fields: "type", "track", "time", "duration", "fill_color", "text", "font_family").
Make JSON for a video that is 1280x720 and 5 seconds long, with the text 'Hello, World!' in red on a black background. The text should be visible from the second to the fourth second.

{"output_format": "mp4", "duration": "5 s", "width": 1280, "height": 720, "elements": [{"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "2 s", "duration": "2 s", "fill_color": "#ff0000", "text": "Hello, World!", "font_family": "Arial"}]}

Given a video description, provide the following fields in a JSON dict: "output_format" (string), "duration" (string), "width" (integer), "height" (integer), and "elements" (array of dicts with fields: "type", "track", "time", "duration", "fill_color", "text", "font_family").
Make JSON for a video that is 1920x1080 and 10 seconds long, with the text 'Welcome to the video' in green on a black background. The text should be visible from the fourth to the seventh second.

{"output_format": "mp4", "duration": "10 s", "width": 1920, "height": 1080, "elements": [{"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "4 s", "duration": "3 s", "fill_color": "#00ff00", "text": "Welcome to the video", "font_family": "Times New Roman"}]}

Make JSON for a video that is 640x480 and 8 seconds long, with the text 'Stay tuned for more' in blue on a black background. The text should be visible from the first to the fifth second.

{"output_format": "mp4", "duration": "8 s", "width": 640, "height": 480, "elements": [{"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "1 s", "duration": "4 s", "fill_color": "#0000ff", "text": "Stay tuned for more", "font_family": "Verdana"}]}

Make JSON for a video that is 1024x768 and 6 seconds long, with the text 'This is a test video' in yellow on a black background. The text should be visible from the start for three seconds.

{"output_format": "mp4", "duration": "6 s", "width": 1024, "height": 768, "elements": [{"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "0 s", "duration": "3 s", "fill_color": "#ffff00", "text": "This is a test video", "font_family": "Helvetica"}]}

Make JSON for a video that is 1920x1080 and 12 seconds long, with the text 'Thanks for watching!' in magenta on a black background. The text should be visible from the fifth to the seventh second.

{"output_format": "mp4", "duration": "12 s", "width": 1920, "height": 1080, "elements": [{"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "5 s", "duration": "2 s", "fill_color": "#ff00ff", "text": "Thanks for watching!", "font_family": "Courier New"}]}
